posts.post_content:
THE INSULT THAT MADE A MAN OUT OF "FERGO"  
  
Darn it! I'm sick and tired of being a scarecrow! Charles Atlas says he can give me a REAL body, all right! I'll gamble 1R postage and get his FREE book!  
  
L  
. A  
... T  
..... E  
....... R  
  
Boy! It didn't take Atlas long to do this for me! Look at this POWER and REGENERATION! That bully won't shove ME around again!

Posted By: Imperialstonedragon (6/18/2011 10:15:27 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
The only mono-red cards that either have a regenerate ability that does not use another color of mana, or grant one, are...Eron the Relentless, [Uthden Troll](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Uthden Troll), this and another aura [Goblin Chirurgeon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Chirurgeon).  
  
How about red cards that require other colors to activate a regenerate ability?  
[Keldon Mantle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Keldon Mantle) has ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol): regenerate.  
[Orcish Healer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Orcish Healer) can regenerate black or green creatures but require those colors to activate.  
[Sedge Sliver](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sedge Sliver) gives all Slivers ![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol): regenerate.  
[Skeletonize](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skeletonize) basically gives you a [Dredge Skeletons](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dredge Skeletons) token.  
[Viashino Skeleton](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Viashino Skeleton) costs ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) and a discard to regenerate. Ouch.  
  
Perhaps this is because red's allied colors black and green have much more regeneration effects available.
posts.html:
The only mono-red cards that either have a regenerate ability that does not use another color of mana, or grant one, are...Eron the Relentless, Uthden Troll, this and another aura Goblin Chirurgeon.

How about red cards that require other colors to activate a regenerate ability?
Keldon Mantle has : regenerate.
Orcish Healer can regenerate black or green creatures but require those colors to activate.
Sedge Sliver gives all Slivers : regenerate.
Skeletonize basically gives you a Dredge Skeletons token.
Viashino Skeleton costs and a discard to regenerate. Ouch.

Perhaps this is because red's allied colors black and green have much more regeneration effects available.
